mapper.sql: idx AS notice_idx, title, content, status, target, DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS create_date_format, update_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( title, content, status, target, create_date, update_date ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{status}, #{target}, NOW(), NULL )
mapper.select: SELECT idx AS notice_idx, title, content, status, target, DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS create_date FROM NOTICE WHERE idx = #{notice_idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET status = 'N', update_date = NOW() WHERE notice_idx = #{notice_idx}
